author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two persons were killed as a sand laden lorry hit a mini van at Minnampalli Pirivu near here on Wednesday.

The accident occurred when a group of seven persons were travelling in a mini-van to take a dip in the Cauvery near Nerur after attending the funeral of Babura (75) of Vaikkal Sandhai.

All the passengers in the mini-van were injured and taken to a private hospital. Of them, Janardhan (10), grandson of Babura, and Lakshmanan (55) of Coimbatore were declared brought dead at the hospital, sources said.
title: Two die in accident
